info.title: Weatherbit - Interactive Swagger UI Documentation
info.description: This an interactive version of the documentation for the Weatherbit API.  The base URL for the API is [http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/) or [https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/). Below is the Swagger UI documentation for the API. All API requests require the `key` parameter.        An Example for a 48 hour forecast for London, UK would be `http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/forecast/hourly?lat=51.5072`&`lon=-0.1276`. See our [Weather API description page](https://www.weatherbit.io/api) for the full documentation.

get.summary: Returns severe weather alerts issued by meteorological agencies - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns severe weather alerts issued by meteorological agencies - given a lat, and a lon.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

get.summary: Returns a Current Observation - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns a Current Observation - given a lat, and a lon.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include 1 hour - minutely precip forecast in the response, or severe weather alerts

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

parameters.name: stations
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Station Call ID's. Example: KRDU,KBFI,KVNY

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Comma separated list of points. Example: (35.5, -75.5),(45, 65),(45.12, -130.5)

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: Comma separated list of City ID's. Example: 4487042, 4494942, 4504871

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

get.summary: Returns nearest and most recent lightning observations - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns nearest and most recent lightning observations - Given a lat/lon.

parameters.name: search_dist_km
parameters.description: Radial search distance from point in KM. (Default 50 - Max 150)

parameters.name: search_mins
parameters.description: Search time backwards from current time in minutes. (Default 30 - Max 240)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by either most recent occurrence, or least distance from point. (Default distance)

get.summary: Returns a daily forecast - Given Lat/Lon.
get.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Default 16.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

get.summary: Returns a 60 minute precipitation forecast - Given Lat/Lon.
get.description: Returns a 60 minute precipitation forecast, where each point represents one minute (1 min) period.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

get.summary: Returns 72 hour (hourly) Air Quality forecast - Given a geolocation.
get.description: Returns 72 hour (hourly) Air Quality forecast, where each point represents a one hour period.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

get.summary: Returns 72 hours of historical air quality conditions - Given a geolocation.
get.description: Returns historical air quality conditions. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

get.summary: Returns current air quality conditions - Given a geolocation.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

get.summary: Returns an hourly forecast - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

get.summary: Returns Agweather Forecast - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Agweather Forecast  - Given a lat, and lon. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

get.summary: Returns Historical Agweather - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Historical Agweather Observations - Given a lat, and lon. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: tp
parameters.description: Time period of calculation (daily [DEFAULT], or hourly).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

get.summary: Returns Historical Climate Normals (Averages) - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Historical Climate Normals (Averages) - Given a lat, and lon. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: tp
parameters.description: Time period of calculation (daily, monthly, or hourly).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: series_year
parameters.description: Series year for calculation. 2020 for 1991-2020. 2010 for 1981-2010.

parameters.name: country

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

get.summary: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter) - to be used with postal_code.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: tz

get.summary: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

get.summary: Returns Energy Forecast API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get.description: Retrieve an 8 day forecast relevant to te Energy Sector (degree days, solar radiation, precipitation, wind).

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

get.summary: Returns Energy API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. See https://www.weatherbit.io/api for API specific rate limits.

parameters.name: tp
parameters.description: Time period to aggregate by (daily, monthly)

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

get.description: Downloads bulk data files - OPTIONS: ( current.csv.gz, forecast_hourly.csv.gz, forecast_daily.csv.gz). Units are Metric (Celcius, m/s, etc).

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". All datetime is in (UTC)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point - Default (mm)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

pod.description: Part of day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". All datetime is in (UTC)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point - default (mm)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point - default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

max_dhi.description: [Deprecated] Max direct component of solar insolation (W/m^2)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". All datetime is in (UTC)

app_temp.description: Apparent Temperature or Wind Chill/Heat Index (Default Celcius)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

app_temp.description: Apparent Temperature or Wind Chill/Heat Index (Default Celcius)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". All datetime is in (UTC)

rh.description: Average relative humidity as a percentage (%)

max_temp_ts.description: Time of max memperature - Unix Timestamp

min_temp_ts.description: Time of max temperature - unix timestamp

max_wind_dir.description: Direction of wind at time of max 2min wind (degrees)

max_wind_spd_ts.description: Time of max 2min wind - unix timestamp

ghi.description: Average hourly global horizontal solar irradiance (W/m^2)

dhi.description: Average hourly diffuse horizontal solar irradiance (W/m^2)

precip_gpm.description: Satellite estimated liquid equivalent precipitation - default (mm)

sources.description: List of data sources used in response

timestamp_utc.description: Full time (UTC) of forecast point (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM)

timestamp_local.description: Full local time of forecast point (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM)

sources.description: List of data sources used in response

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

slp.description: Mean sea level pressure in millibars (mb)

aqi.description: Air quality index (US EPA standard 0 to +500)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

bearing_cardinal.description: Cardinal direction of lightning relative to point

bearing_degrees.description: Direction of lightning relative to point in degrees

distance_km.description: Distance of lightning from point in kilometers

distance_mi.description: Distance of lightning from point in miles

timestamp_utc.description: Timestamp of lightning at UTC timezone (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

timestamp_local.description: Timestamp of lightning at local timezone (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

past_mins.description: Amount of time passed since lightning lightning (in minutes).

limit.description: Count of results in response (determined by limit parameter).

search_distance_km.description: Distance searched for lightning (radially) in KM.

search_mins.description: Time backwards from current time searched for lightning.

sort.description: Ascending sort key of data (time or distance).

sun_hours.description: Average number of daily sun hours - # hours where Solar GHI > 1000 W/m^2

sources.description: List of data sources used in response

sun_hours.description: Average number of daily sun hours - # hours where Solar GHI > 1000 W/m^2

title.example: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 8:51PM CST expiring February 12 at 8:24AM CST by NWS St Louis MO

description.example:
Mississippi River at Chester

.This Flood Warning is a result of 1-2 inches of rainfall across
the basin earlier this week...
The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Chester
* until Tuesday morning.
* At  8:30 PM Friday the stage was 26.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by tonight and to
crest near 29.0 feet by Saturday evening. The river is forecast to
fall below flood stage by Monday morning.
* Impact:  At 28.0 feet...Unleveed islands near Chester and the prison
farm floods.
* Impact:  At 27.0 feet...Flood Stage.  Unprotected farmland on right
bank begins to flood.
